This module exports data from tt_products to another table which can be imported into Magento as CSV file (after exporting the 2nd table with e.g. phpmyadmin).

Additionally the customers of the table tt_products_customer can be exported using the same way to import them as customers of Magento.

The export won't work out of the box! You will need to adopt the code which you find at typo3conf/ext/magentoimport/mod1/index.php

This extension has been used to import more than 4000 products to Magento from a very old and hacked tt_products version. </br > Out of this reason the functionality is very limited and modifications are necessary to fit the extension to your tt_products version and your needs (e.g. different product attributes in Magento)! Adapations are still very easy because you just need to follow those steps (better described in the manual): <ol > <li >Adapt with phpmyadmin the export table (magento_products, magento_users).</li > <li >Adapt the file ext/magentoimport/mod1/index.php by changing the functions createProducts() and createCustomer(): Add the new/changed fields to the insert-statement.</li > <li > Run the extension and fill the export tables </li > <li > Export the export_tables by using phpmyadmin again. Export the data as CSV. </li > <li > Import the csv file in Magento by using the Magento Importer. </li >
</ol >
Hopefully you are done! Have fun with Magento, I love it!
